name: emi.lb
description:
The Logging and Bookkeeping service (LB for short) was initially developed in the EU DataGrid project1

as a part of the Workload Management System (WMS). The development continued in the EGEE, EGEEII

and EGEE-III projects,2 where LB became an independent part of the gLite3 middleware [1], and then

in the EMI Project
releaseNotes: This is a bugfix release of LB 3.2, providing fixes for occasional notification interlogger crashes and problems with dumping and loading LB events. A few minor bugs have also been fixed and documentation was updated to reflect LB's release status and several new tests.
changeLog: This is a bugfix release of LB 3.2, providing fixes for occasional notification interlogger crashes and problems with dumping and loading LB events. A few minor bugs have also been fixed and documentation was updated to reflect LB's release status and several new tests.
